Line: You forget that Sirius was my friend too. You are not the only person on this earth capable of feelings, Harry.

Name: Albus Dumbledore
Line: There is no shame in feeling pain, Harry. It is your greatest strength...

Name: Harry Potter
Line: You don't have a clue! You can't possibly know!

Name: Albus Dumbledore
Line: What can't I know?

Name: Albus Dumbledore
Line: This pain is part of being human, Harry...

Name: Harry Potter
Line: I don't care! I don't care!

Name: Albus Dumbledore
Line: You do care. You care so much you feel like you will bleed to death because of it.

Name: Harry Potter
Line: Let me out.

Name: Albus Dumbledore
Line: No.

Name: Harry Potter
Line: You can't keep me in here!

Name: Albus Dumbledore
Line: I daresay I can. And if you actually do attack me with that wand, Harry, I'm afraid to say you will regret it.

Name: Albus Dumbledore
Line: It is my fault Sirius died tonight.

Name: Albus Dumbledore
Line: Harry, I owe you this explanation, to show you the failings of an old man.

Name: Harry Potter
Line: I already know all this.

Name: Albus Dumbledore
Line: Haven't you wondered why I haven't spoken to you, even looked at you, for months?

Name: Harry Potter
Line: Well, yeah, I did...

Name: Albus Dumbledore
Line: Sirius told me you believed there was a snake inside of you. This was Voldemort attempting to manipulate you. To protect you from this, I had you study Occlumency.

Name: Harry Potter
Line: But Snape stopped giving me lessons.

Name: Albus Dumbledore
Line: Yes. I thought he could overcome his feelings towards your father, but I was wrong. Some wounds cut too deep to be healed.

Name: Harry Potter
Line: He barely taught me, though. I always felt more open to it after the lessons. Like he was trying to open me to Voldemort—-

Name: Albus Dumbledore
Line: I would trust Severus Snape with my life, Harry. You have never recovered from your mistrust of him in your first year.

Name: Harry Potter
Line: Sirius didn't trust him. Didn't believe he'd really turned to our side...

Name: Albus Dumbledore
Line: Again, some wounds run too deep to be healed, Harry. Severus and Sirius never liked each other at school. This has never changed.

Name: Albus Dumbledore
Line: During your Occulumency lessons, Professor Snape discovered that you were dreaming about the door in the Department of Mysteries.

Name: Harry Potter
Line: I've been dreaming about that all year, before Voldemort discovered the connection.

Name: Albus Dumbledore
Line: Yes. Voldemort has been obsessed with hearing that prophesy since he returned. Because of your scar, what he was obsessed with, you were obsessed with, in the form of dreams.

Name: Albus Dumbledore
Line: Once he discovered the connection, Voldemort had little difficulty in manipulating you into thinking he had captured Sirius.

Name: Harry Potter
Line: But I checked Grimmauld Place! Kreacher said--

Name: Albus Dumbledore
Line: Kreacher lied. He wanted you to go to the Department of Mysteries.

Name: Harry Potter
Line: Why?

Name: Albus Dumbledore
Line: Kreacher has been serving two masters for some months now.

Name: Harry Potter
Line: What?

Name: Harry Potter
Line: Wait, where was Sirius when I tried to contact him?

Name: Albus Dumbledore
Line: Ah. Apparently Kreacher had injured Buckbeak to distract him in case you tried to contact Headquarters.

Name: Albus Dumbledore
Line: Sirius was tending to the wounds when you called.

Name: Harry Potter
Line: And Hermione said we should be nice to Kreacher!

Name: Albus Dumbledore
Line: She was quite right, Harry. Kreacher is what wizards have made him. He is to be pitied, not hated.

Name: Harry Potter
Line: Sirius hated him.

Name: Albus Dumbledore
Line: He didn't hate Kreacher himself. Kreacher was a reminder to Sirius of the home he had always hated.

Name: Harry Potter
Line: Yeah, he really hated that place. And you kept him locked up in there!

Name: Albus Dumbledore
Line: I was trying to save his life!

Name: Albus Dumbledore
Line: I also knew that Voldemort would return one day. I played to his weakness. There is an ancient magic which Voldemort has always underestimated.

Name: Albus Dumbledore
Line: This magic is what your mother gave you when she died. That protection would only work, however, if you were cared for by a blood relative. Your Aunt, Petunia.

Name: Harry Potter
Line: She never loved me.

Name: Albus Dumbledore
Line: Perhaps not. But she took you in, however grudgingly. As long as you can call your Aunt's house your home, you are protected.

Name: Albus Dumbledore
Line: And now we come to the moment of terrible truth, the moment I have dreaded for fifteen years. The moment when I must lay another burden atop your already straining shoulders.

Name: Albus Dumbledore
Line: Do you remember your first year here? When you lay in the hospital wing fresh from your confrontation with Voldemort?

Name: Albus Dumbledore
Line: Do you remember what you asked me that night?

Name: Harry Potter
Line: I asked you why Voldemort tried to kill me.

Name: Albus Dumbledore
Line: You have no idea the pain it causes me to tell it to you, even now. But unfortunately, I must.

Name: Harry Potter
Line: I don't understand, Professor.

Name: Harry Potter
Line: Professor, why am I so important to

Name: Albus Dumbledore
Line: An excellent question, Harry. The answer lies in the prophesy.

Name: Harry Potter
Line: Sir, it got smashed.

Name: Albus Dumbledore
Line: That was not the only place the Prophesy is preserved.

Name: Sybill Trelawney
Line: "The One with the power to vanquish the Dark Lord approaches....Born to

Name: Harry Potter
Line: I'm not sure I understand all that, sir...

Name: Harry Potter
Line: And...it means me?

Name: Albus Dumbledore
Line: Interestingly, there were two boys whom the prophesy could have been referring to. You and Neville Longbottom.

Name: Harry Potter
Line: So it's not necessarily me, sir?

Name: Harry Potter
Line: What if he chose wrong?

Name: Harry Potter
Line: Why didn't he wait? Why attack when we were babies?

Name: Albus Dumbledore
Line: Voldemort had an informant listening to my meeting with Professor Trelawney. Fortunately he was discovered before he could hear the entire prophesy. Voldemort had to act immediately, he didn't know the rest of the prophesy. All he knew was that he had to destroy the child who would grow to be a threat to his power.

Name: Harry Potter
Line: But I don't have any special powers.

Name: Albus Dumbledore
Line: There is a room in the Department of Mysteries which is kept locked at all times. It contains a force so wonderful and yet terrible that it is greater than death itself. It is that power which you have incredible amounts of and of which Voldemort has none.

Name: Harry Potter
Line: What is it, sir?

Name: Albus Dumbledore
Line: There is only the end of the prophesy which we haven't addressed. It states "neither can live while the other survives."

Name: Albus Dumbledore
Line: It is the final burden which I must place on you, Harry.

Name: Harry Potter
Line: One of us has to kill the other...in the end.

Name: Albus Dumbledore
Line: Yes.

Name: Nearly Headless Nick
Line: Hello, Harry.

Name: Harry Potter
Line: Hey, Nick.

Name: Nearly Headless Nick
Line: I--Well, Madam Pomfrey asked me to tell you that Hermione and Ron are out of the hospital wing.

Name: Harry Potter
Line: Oh. Thanks.

Name: Harry Potter
Line: Nick, I was wondering about something?

Name: Nearly Headless Nick
Line: I've been expecting this...

Name: Harry Potter
Line: Expecting what?

Name: Nearly Headless Nick
Line: A lot of people come to me when they've lost loved ones.

Name: Harry Potter
Line: I expect so...

Name: Nearly Headless Nick
Line: He's not coming back, Harry.

Name: Harry Potter
Line: Why?

Name: Nearly Headless Nick
Line: I'm sorry I couldn't be of more

Name: Hermione Granger
Line: Harry!

Name: Harry Potter
Line: How are you?

Name: Ron Weasley
Line: Good as new, mate.

Name: Harry Potter
Line: Better.

Name: Hermione Granger
Line: Come on, let's go in to the feast.

Name: Harry Potter
Line: I've got something to tell you. Something important.

Name: Harry Potter
Line: But not right now. I'm not ready.

Name: Hermione Granger
Line: Take your time, Harry. We'll be here when you are.

Name: Luna Lovegood
Line: Hello, Harry.

Name: Luna Lovegood
Line: It's the last night and I need to pack.

Name: Luna Lovegood
Line: Oh, people take my things and hide them.

Name: Luna Lovegood
Line: I don't think they like me much. Some of them call me "Loony" Lovegood.

Name: Harry Potter
Line: Do you need any help looking?

Name: Luna Lovegood
Line: Oh no. It all turns up in the end.

Name: Luna Lovegood
Line: Sirius Black. Hermione said he was your Godfather.

Name: Harry Potter
Line: Yeah.

Name: Luna Lovegood
Line: My mother. I was nine.

Name: Harry Potter
Line: I'm sorry.

Name: Luna Lovegood
Line: It's okay. It's not like I'll never see her again.

Name: Harry Potter
Line: Isn't it?

Name: Luna Lovegood
Line: Don't tell me you didn't hear them. The voices beyond the Veil?

Name: Luna Lovegood
Line: They were just out of sight, that's all.

Name: Luna Lovegood
Line: Of course. Anyway, my mum always said the things we lose have a way of coming back to us in the end. If not always in the way we expect. Think I'll just go have some pudding.

Name: Harry Potter
Line: I've been thinking about something Dumbledore said to me.

Name: Hermione Granger
Line: What's that ?

Name: Harry Potter
Line: That even though we've got a fight ahead of us we've got one thing that Voldemort doesn't have.

Name: Ron Weasley
Line: Yeah ?

Name: Harry Potter
Line: Something worth fighting for
